episodes.title: The Last Dragon Ball
episodes.plot: The start of the "Fortune Teller Baba Saga". Goku finishes off Staff Officer Black while Yamcha and the others decide on a plan.

episodes.title: Who Is Fortuneteller Baba?
episodes.plot: When they can't find the last dragon ball on the radar, Goku, Krillin, and Yamcha go to Fortune Teller Baba's Palace to ask for her services. Along the way, they pick up Upa.

episodes.title: We Are the Five Warriors
episodes.plot: Since Goku and the others do not have enough money to pay for Fortune Teller Baba's services, she agrees to tell them where the seventh dragon ball is only if they can defeat her five fighters in combat. Their first task is to defeat Fang the Vampire.

episodes.title: Deadly Battle
episodes.plot: Goku brings Roshi and Bulma to Baba's palace, because Krillin has a plan that will help Yamcha in his fight against the Invisible Man.

episodes.title: Goku's Turn
episodes.plot: Yamcha battles Baba's third fighter, a mummy who is much quicker than he looks.

episodes.title: The Devilmite Beam
episodes.plot: Goku faces the mummy who defeated Yamcha. He then faces Baba's fourth fighter, the Devil Man.

episodes.title: The Mysterious Fifth Man
episodes.plot: The fight between Goku and the Devil Man concludes. Also, Goku meets his final opponent, a mysterious masked man who seems familiar.

episodes.title: The Strong Ones
episodes.plot: Goku fights his fifth and final opponent, the mysterious masked man.

episodes.title: The True Colors of the Masked Man
episodes.plot: The fight between Goku and the masked man, who has now been revealed as Goku's grandfather Gohan, concludes. Meanwhile, Pilaf uses a satellite to spy on Goku.

episodes.title: Pilaf's Tactics
episodes.plot: Goku searches for the car that contains the last dragon ball. He finds it, and in order to get the dragon ball he must fight against Pilaf, Shuu, and Mai, who have the advantage of the power suits that Pilaf created.

episodes.title: The Eternal Dragon Rises
episodes.plot: Having taken the final dragon ball, Goku returns to Baba's palace to get Upa. Together, they return to the Land of Korin to call upon the eternal dragon to restore Upa's father to life.

episodes.title: Terror and Plague
episodes.plot: Since Roshi told him that he cannot teach him anything else, Goku travels the world looking for new adventures. He meets a young girl whose village is being terrorized by two thugs, so he goes with her to the village to confront them.

episodes.title: Goku vs. Sky Dragon
episodes.plot: On the advice of an old woman whom he helps, Goku goes to a small town looking to battle Master Chen, the strongest fighter in town. Chen, however, has his own fight with Sky Dragon, a rival martial artist from the same town. In order to win the title of Master of Martial Arts, and save his struggling dojo, Chen must defeat Sky Dragon the next day in the King's Match. Unfortunately, Chen is in poor health and cannot fight, so Goku fights in his stead.

episodes.title: Goku Goes to Demon Land
episodes.plot: Goku goes to a village whose princess has been captured by demons and taken back to Demon Land. In order to rescue her Goku must venture through the portal of the dead and defeat Shula, the lord of Demon Land. Once he does this he will be able to remove Shula's sword from the portal's entrance, thus closing it and preventing any more demons from coming through.

episodes.title: The Rampage of InoShikaCho
episodes.plot: Goku meets a family who has fled its village, which is being rampaged by a monster called InoShikaCho. Goku goes to the village to fight the beast, but two other mysterious fighters get there first and defeat it, for a fee. Later, Goku learns that they are working together with InoShikaCho to scam villagers out of money, and he confronts them. Meanwhile, Roshi continues to train Krillin and Yamcha, and he tells the story of InoShikaCho.

episodes.title: Which Way to Papaya Island?
episodes.plot: Goku saves a fox named Konkichi from a group of thugs, and they befriend one another. In gratitude, Konkichi offers to take Goku to the airport so that he can get to Papaya Island for the next World Martial Arts Tournament, which begins the following day. Unfortunately, neither has enough money for a ticket, so they go to the carnival to win some quick cash at the games. Afterward they return to the airport, where they run into Fortune Teller Baba. She sees that Konkichi is a crook, and he realizes it, so he runs away and gets into more trouble. It is up to Goku to ...
